message.petsplus.scout_backpack.route.pl: Loot will now go to your inventory.
petsplus.guardian.fortress_break: %s drifts out of range! Fortress bond snaps.

petsplus.guardian.fortress_down_generic: Your guardian falls—the fortress bond shatters.
petsplus.guardian.fortress_dim: The fortress bond cannot span dimensions.

petsplus.eepyeeper.phantom_ward: ✦ Your sleepy companion wards off nightmares... ✦
petsplus.eepyeeper.sleep_bonus: Restful Dreams: Your Eepy Eeper shares peaceful slumber benefits!

petsplus.stargaze.session_start: You begin to share a quiet moment under the stars...
petsplus.stargaze.too_far: You must stay close to your companion...
petsplus.snuggle.start: %s nestles in close, ready for a cozy snuggle.
petsplus.ability_token.missing: This token is missing an ability.

petsplus.adv.first_pet.title: Best Friends Forever++
petsplus.adv.first_pet.desc: A quiet glance... It's official—you belong to each other.
petsplus.adv.gentle_touch.title: Boop
petsplus.adv.gentle_touch.desc: The first soft pat. Connection begins here.
petsplus.adv.devoted_companion.title: Devoted Companion
petsplus.adv.devoted_companion.desc: A hundred gentle moments. Your bond speaks louder than words.
petsplus.adv.trial_ready.title: Trial-Ready
petsplus.adv.melody_wind.title: The Melody of the Wind
petsplus.adv.melody_wind.desc: Where space's symphony frays the mind, the wind hums relief for the weary traveler.
petsplus.adv.edgewalker.title: Edgewalker
petsplus.adv.edgewalker.desc: You danced on the edge; the void hit the renegade in playful retalliation.
petsplus.adv.bestest_friends_forevererer: You grew together, you survived together—now you're together forever.
petsplus.adv.or_not.title: Or Not.
petsplus.adv.or_not.desc: Forever is long. Goodbye was instant.
petsplus.adv.sacrilege.title: The Truest Form of Sacrilege
petsplus.adv.sacrilege.desc: Luckily you chose a frontline. Or at least appointed one.
petsplus.adv.mmm_healing_magic.title: Mmmm Healing Magic!
petsplus.adv.mmm_healing_magic.desc: Never bring a gun to a wavy-hands fight.
petsplus.adv.is_this_designer.title: Is This Designer?
petsplus.adv.is_this_designer.desc: We got a couple of upgrades if you like 'em bizzare, we could give you an upgrade that can play guitar, like.
petsplus.adv.i_love_you_and_me.title: I love you and me
petsplus.adv.noo_luna.title: Noo, Luna!
petsplus.adv.noo_luna.desc: A heartfelt, dramatic sacrifice; your companion took the hit so you didn't.
petsplus.adv.at_what_cost.title: At what cost…
petsplus.adv.heartless_but_alive.title: Heartless, but Alive.
petsplus.adv.heartless_but_alive.desc: Three times, huh. The world feels heavier than it did yesterday...
petsplus.adv.restless_sit_glow.title: Restless Sit Glow
petsplus.adv.restless_sit_glow.desc: Guide a Restless III companion into any Happy tier using ambience alone.
petsplus.adv.here_comes_the_sunbeam.desc: Bask together as Happy III blooms for the first time.
petsplus.adv.please_fcking_play_with_me_: Stage the riot that rockets your bond into Playful III.
petsplus.adv.curiousity_thrilled_the_cat: Let Curious III trill through the ruins without losing a single paw step.
petsplus.adv.ride_or_die.title: Ride or Die (please don't die)
petsplus.adv.ride_or_die.desc: Witness your pet's Passionate Mood reach its most intense level for the first time.
petsplus.adv.passionate_heart.title: Passionate Heart
petsplus.adv.passionate_heart.desc: Passionate III roars to life—your bond is pure wildfire.
petsplus.adv.bond_voyage.title: Bond Voyage!
petsplus.adv.be_more_chilllllll.title: Be More Chilllllll
petsplus.adv.be_more_chilllllll.desc: Settle Calm III with a perfectly chilled session.
petsplus.adv.yugen_sigh_sigh.title: Yugen Sigh Sigh
petsplus.adv.yugen_sigh_sigh.desc: Let Yugen III land with a shared, momentous sigh.
petsplus.adv.sipping_sisurp_in_my_ride.d: Witness a pet's Sisu Mood at its most intense for the first time.
petsplus.adv.finnish_him.title: Finnish Him
petsplus.adv.finnish_him.desc: Sisu III ignites—winter bows to your relentless duo.
petsplus.adv.wish_you_were_here_fur_real: Wish You Were Here Fur Real
Summon Saudade III by revisiting keepsake-laced memories.
petsplus.adv.afraidiana_grande.title: Afraidiana Grande
petsplus.adv.afraidiana_grande.desc: Keep Afraid III cresting through the haunt, then stick the fearless encore.
petsplus.adv.are_you_mad_at_me.title: Are You Mad at Me?
petsplus.adv.are_you_mad_at_me.desc: Spark Angry III, then soothe it with an apologetic cuddle before sparks fly.
petsplus.adv.guardian_of_the_grrr_laxy.d: Hold Protective III while shielding a spread of allies.
petsplus.adv.bonding_basics.title: Bonding Basics
petsplus.adv.bonding_basics.desc: Learn the fundamentals of pet care and connection.
petsplus.adv.emotional_journey.title: Moody
petsplus.adv.emotional_journey.desc: Experience 5 different mood types with your pet.
petsplus.adv.mood_explorer.title: Mood Explorer
petsplus.adv.mood_explorer.desc: Chart ten distinct moods with your companion.
petsplus.adv.emotional_mastery.title: Emotional Mastery
petsplus.adv.emotional_mastery.desc: Nurture any mood to Rank III—resonance refined.
petsplus.adv.positive_moods.title: Positive Moods
petsplus.adv.calm_moods.title: Calm Moods
petsplus.adv.calm_moods.desc: Find peace and tranquility with your pet.
petsplus.adv.complex_moods.title: Complex Moods
petsplus.adv.mood_transitions.title: Mood Transitions
petsplus.adv.mood_transitions.desc: Guide your pet through emotional changes.
petsplus.adv.mystical_connections.title: Mystical Connections
petsplus.adv.mystical_connections.desc: Discover deeper magical connections with your pet.
petsplus.adv.role_specialization.title: Role Specialization
petsplus.adv.role_specialization.desc: Master the unique abilities of different pet roles.
petsplus.adv.guardian_path.title: Guardian's Path
petsplus.adv.guardian_path.desc: Raise a guardian to level 15; your shield learns to stand on its own.
petsplus.adv.support_path.title: Support Path
petsplus.adv.support_path.desc: Guide a support to level 15 so the brew never runs dry.
petsplus.adv.skyrider_path.title: Skyrider Path
petsplus.adv.skyrider_path.desc: Lift a skyrider to level 15 and let the winds remember you.
petsplus.adv.eclipsed_path.title: Eclipsed Path
petsplus.adv.eclipsed_path.desc: Temper an eclipsed companion to level 15 amid the void's hum.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_break.ore: Your pets light up at the glittering find.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_break.craftin: Fresh building stock stirs your crew's cozy plans.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_break.resourc: The grind steels your companions' resolve.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_break.generic: Your companions follow your steady work rhythm.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill_: Victory hums along the bond, adapting to every tale.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill: Your victory sends brave ripples through your bond.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill_c: That close call leaves your pets buzzing with relief.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill_h: Your pets relish shielding you from %s's menace.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill_p: Gentle eyes linger on %s even in victory.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_kill_b: %s's fall sends proud shivers through your pack.
petsplus.emotion_cue.combat.owner_swing: Your companions tense as you lunge toward %s.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.food: Shared bites remind your pets of hearth and home.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.golden_apple: The shimmering bite reassures your companions.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.enchanted_gold: Ancient sweetness floods your circle with wonder.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.honey_bottle: Sweet comfort drifts from the honeyed sip.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.milk_bucket: A cleansing draught puts your friends at ease.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.totem: Even your pets exhale at the warded fate.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.ender_pearl: Your companions feel the call of far horizons.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.firework: Crackling sparks rile your crew's adventurous spirit.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.sus_food: Your pets cringe at the risky snack.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.spyglass: Eyes widen as distant vistas bloom.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.map: A new map whispers of unseen roads.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.compass: The needle steadies everyone toward home.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.recovery_compa: Loss lingers as your pets sense the recovery trail.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.shield: The raised shield promises shared safety.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.saddle: Travel itches at paws and hooves alike.
petsplus.emotion_cue.item.brush: Ancient dust stirs your companions' curiosity.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.grindston: Sharpening edges stir a hint of regret.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.beacon: Radiant beams leave your pets awestruck.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.bell: A warm chime gathers everyone close.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.bee: Gentle buzzing melts your companions' hearts.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.decor: Small touches make your shelter feel lived-in.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.jukebox_s: A new tune spins up and tails sway to the beat.
Silence settles as the last notes fade from the room.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_place.decor: Cozy decor makes your companions nestle in.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_place.craftin: New structure bones excite their builder's spirit.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_place.generic: Raising walls puts eager spring in their steps.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.music: Music drifts and your pets sway along.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.campfire_: The campfire crackles brighter and your pets bask in the glow.
You spark the fire alive; hopeful eyes gleam in the light.
A soft hiss signals safety as embers fade and paws relax.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.cooking: Kitchen clatter smells like supper for friends.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.home: Home comforts wrap your companions in calm.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.bed_rest: Fluffed bedding promises a cozy night's watch together.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.bed_occup: Someone beat you to the bed—your pets huff in mild protest.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.crafting: Crafting hum fills your pets with mindful focus.
petsplus.emotion_cue.block_use.enchantin: Arcane murmurs sparkle in curious eyes.
petsplus.emotion_cue.entity.lead: A gentle tug reminds everyone of your bond.
petsplus.emotion_cue.entity.villager_gre: Your pets watch the friendly exchange with interest.
petsplus.emotion_cue.entity.trade: Bartered goods soften your partners' moods.
petsplus.emotion_cue.entity.trade_food: Prospects of fresh fare make tails sway.
petsplus.emotion_cue.entity.trade_mystic: Sacred wares leave your pets in reverent hush.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.rain: Distant thunderheads gather; your companions watch the rain roll in.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.rain_start: Raindrops patter; your pets huddle close.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.rain_end: Clear skies set hopeful eyes alight.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.thunder: Thunder rolls and your companions brace.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.moonlight: Moonlight paints soft silver across curious muzzles.
petsplus.emotion_cue.time.dawn: First light lifts your companions' spirits.
petsplus.emotion_cue.time.dusk: Twilight hush puts everyone on reflective edge.
petsplus.emotion_cue.time.night: Night drapes your pets in quiet wonder.
petsplus.emotion_cue.idle.ennui: Idleness creeps in; your pets yearn for activity.
petsplus.emotion_cue.idle.night_peaceful: Night hushes the world; your pets relax beside you.
petsplus.emotion_cue.idle.rainy: Rainy stillness weighs on your companions.
petsplus.emotion_cue.idle.rainy_cozy: Rain taps the roof; your pets settle into the cozy lull.
petsplus.emotion_cue.idle.restless: Restless paws drum for something to do.
petsplus.emotion_cue.owner.low_hunger: Your crew senses your hunger pangs and rallies.
petsplus.emotion_cue.owner.death: Grief howls through the pack as your light falters.
petsplus.emotion_cue.journey.homecoming: Home at last—your companions melt into familiar warmth.
petsplus.emotion_cue.music.parrot_dance: %s bobs to the beat, feathers flashing.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.alpha: %s stands tall, the pack's lead heartbeat.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.beta: %s settles into the middle of the pack's rhythm.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.eldest: %s carries the elders' wisdom with quiet grace.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.leash: %s keeps pace on the lead, loyal yet aching for freedom.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.leash.slack: %s heels close, relishing the shared tether even as wanderlust lingers.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.leash.dragge: %s chafes under the taut lead, dutiful but straining against the pull.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.leash.leadin: %s noses ahead on the lead, thrilled to scout while your grip reins them in.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.leash.braced: %s plants their paws and braces the lead, steadfast beside you yet craving open space.

petsplus.emotion_cue.social.combat: %s bristles, ready to follow your swing.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.sneak: %s tilts their head at your hush.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.omega: %s hangs back, loyal despite the rank.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.elder: %s watches the seasoned companion with respect.
petsplus.emotion_cue.social.pair: %s drifts closer, syncing steps with their favorite companion.
petsplus.emotion_cue.movement.swim: %s cuts through the water with ease.
petsplus.emotion_cue.weather.rain_cat: %s begs for shelter from the rain.
petsplus.emotion_cue.inventory.valuables: Your stash gleams; your pets stand guard.
petsplus.emotion_cue.inventory.food: Packed meals soothe every belly nearby.
petsplus.emotion_cue.inventory.weapons: Arms at the ready steel your companions.
petsplus.emotion_cue.inventory.tools: Tools in hand make everyone itch to build.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.guardian_vigil: %s squares up to cover your wounds.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.guardian_hold: %s shields your flank as danger closes in.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.striker_execut: %s rides the rush of a clean takedown.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.enchanter_attu: %s hums in tune with the table's glow.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.cursed_nether: %s drinks in the Nether's hungry heat.
petsplus.emotion_cue.role.eepy_dream: %s's sleepy aura settles deeper around the camp.
petsplus.emotion_cue.petting.cooldown: %s is still savoring the last cuddles.
petsplus.emotion_cue.petting.first: %s's trust sparks at this first gentle moment.
petsplus.emotion_cue.support.potion_read: %s shakes off lingering brews and readies for another.
petsplus.emotion_cue.support.potion_lock: %s hasn't learned to carry potions yet.
petsplus.emotion_cue.support.potion_inco: %s sniffs the brew—it doesn't match what they're carrying.
petsplus.emotion_cue.support.potion_stor: %s tucks the potion away for your allies.
petsplus.emotion_cue.sleep.rested: Fresh rest softens every loyal paw.
petsplus.emotion_cue.sleep.anchor: Even in the Nether, a tethered rest calms your companions.
petsplus.emotion_cue.journal.empty: Your companions haven't held back any cues lately.

petsplus.emotion_cue.species.horse.graze: %s settles down at the sight of hay and quiet stalls.

petsplus.emotion_cue.species.parrot.flig: %s wheels through the open air with bright curiosity.
petsplus.emotion_cue.species.cat.bed: %s kneads into the bedding and purrs contentedly.
petsplus.emotion_cue.species.cat.chest: %s posts up on the chest and claims the hoard.
petsplus.emotion_cue.species.ocelot.stal: %s slinks low, ears keyed to every rustle.
petsplus.emotion_cue.species.ocelot.jung: %s melts back into the jungle's embrace.
